subject: Re: [junit] problem with httpunit
msgSnippet: Is that all you do? I don t see why it would try to connect to www.gmx.de. Or maybe I just don t understand google or something... :) Anyway I tried to run it
messageBody:
Is that all you do? I don't see why it would try to connect to www.gmx.de.
Or maybe I just don't understand google or something... :)

Anyway I tried to run it myself and it works for me. I can connect to
www.gmx.de if that makes a difference, though I still don't see why the
code would do that..

On Thu, 15 Jul 2004, thecyriuz82 wrote:

> Hi everybody,
>
> today I tried to write my first httpunit test. And of course it
> don't run.
> Can anybody help me? At the moment I don't know why I can't get
> connection to the host.
> I get an Error meassage like the following:
>
> Time: 16,516
> There was 1 error:
> 1) testSearch(GoogleTest)java.net.UnknownHostException: www.gmx.de
> ---------------------------------------------
>
>
> The code of my testclass is like this:
>
> public void testSearch() throws Exception {
>
> WebConversation wc = new WebConversation();
> WebRequest request = new GetMethodWebRequest
> ("http://www.google.com");
> WebResponse resp = wc.getResponse(request);
> WebForm form = resp.getForms()[0];
> form.setParameter("q" , "HttpUnit");
> WebRequest req = form.getRequest("btnG");
> resp = wc.getResponse(req);
> -----------------------------------------------
>
